description: The common libraries and utilities that provides the basic Hadoop runtime environment (HDFS/Map Reduce). A set of components and interfaces which implements a distributed filesystem and provides general I/O access for the hadoop framework (serialization, Java RPC and persistent data storage).

recipes.hadoop::default: Installs hadoop base libraries and configuration.
recipes.hadoop::masternamenode: Installs the master name node package and prepares the file system.
recipes.hadoop::secondarynamenode: Installs the secondary name node package and prepares the file system.
recipes.hadoop::datanode: Installs the slave node and task tracker packages and prepares the file system.
recipes.hadoop::edgenode: Installs the edge node and task tracker packages and prepares the file system.
recipes.hadoop::cloudera-scm-server: Install the Cloudera Service and Configuration Manager (SCM) server.
recipes.hadoop::cloudera-scm-agent: Install the Cloudera Service and Configuration Manager (SCM) agent.

name: hadoop
